GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
media: xilinx: vipp: Fix refcount leak in xvip_graph_dma_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 59b315353252abe7b8fdb8651ca31b8484ce287a, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit df3305156f989339529b3d6744b898d498fb1f7b. For more details please see the references link.
